projects.title: Freelance Flow
projects.subtitle: Tools for Effortless Freelancing
projects.description: FreelanceFlow is an all-in-one toolset designed for freelancers. Generate proposals, sign contracts, create invoices, and more — all with one click, no logins, and no hassle. Built for independent professionals looking to streamline their workflow and stay productive on their terms.

projects.title: QuickSync
projects.subtitle: Sync & Access Across Devices
projects.description: QuickSync is a cross-device platform for managing and syncing links, tasks, and bookmarks effortlessly. Save, organize, and access important content anytime, anywhere — whether on desktop, mobile, or tablet. Designed for productivity enthusiasts who want  instant link sync.

projects.title: Templify.art
projects.subtitle: React Native & Next.js templates
projects.description: Templify is a platform to discover, download, and share high-quality templates for a variety of tech stacks, including React Native, Next.js, and more. Designed for developers and designers to accelerate project development with beautifully crafted UI kits and boilerplates.

projects.title: ColorCraft.Dev
projects.subtitle: The Ultimate Color Toolkit
projects.description: Color Craft is a smart color toolkit designed for designers, developers, and artists. It helps you extract, generate, and manage color palettes effortlessly. Whether you're designing a website, UI, branding, or just looking for inspiration, Color Craft provides an intuitive experience..

projects.title: Transfine Digital
projects.subtitle: Everyday Utility Apps for Everyone
projects.description: Transfine Digital is a curated collection of simple, useful mobile apps designed to solve everyday problems. From calculators and converters to timers and planners, each app is lightweight, easy to use, and built with performance in mind. A showcase of practical tools made with React Native — all in one place.

projects.title: Open Source Repo Finder
projects.subtitle: Discover and Explore Open Source Repositories with Ease
projects.description: An app built to help developers find random GitHub repositories based on a selected programming language. It displays repository details like name, description, stars, forks, and open issues, with a feature to fetch another repository seamlessly.

projects.title: Markdown Previewer
projects.subtitle: Real-Time Markdown to HTML Preview Tool
projects.description: A user-friendly tool for developers and writers to preview Markdown content in real-time. It converts Markdown syntax into formatted HTML, enabling seamless content creation and visualization.

projects.title: NCERT E-Book Reader
projects.subtitle: Read and Explore NCERT Books Online
projects.description: A web app designed for students and educators to access and read NCERT books seamlessly. It provides a clean and intuitive interface for browsing and reading educational material.

projects.title: Flawwless
projects.subtitle: Legal Educational Platform
projects.description: Founded the app which helps users to get a better understanding of the law and consume unbiased information. Some of the features of the app are reading articles, an Inbuilt dictionary, Rich resources, and Easy to use.

projects.title: Automatic Expense Manager
projects.subtitle: Manage And Track Finances
projects.description: This is a React Native mobile application that enables users to manage and track their finances automatically through transaction sms.

projects.title: Device Info
projects.subtitle: Android System Insight
projects.description: Developed an app that provides in-depth insights into a user's device hardware, software, and connectivity. Offers a comprehensive overview of the device's specifications

projects.title: QR Code
projects.subtitle: Scanner & Generator
projects.description: This is an app for easy QR code management, allowing users to scan existing codes and create custom QR codes.

projects.title: Meta Data
projects.subtitle: Link Previewer
projects.description: Created a Link Previewer web application that can provide your Link's Metadata such as type, images, title, and description.

projects.title: Earth Observatory
projects.subtitle: Natural Event Tracker
projects.description: Developed a web application using Google Map API that can help users keep track of various natural events such as wildfires from all over the world.

projects.title: Taskify
projects.subtitle: Manage tasks easily
projects.description: Developed task management app using React Native that allows users to create, organize, and track tasks efficiently. The app provides features like categorization, due dates to enhance productivity.

projects.title: Orbital
projects.subtitle: Explore the Universe
projects.description: A space exploration app using NASA APIs to provide real-time data on Mars rovers, asteroids, Earth imagery, space media, and the ISS position. Designed for space enthusiasts to explore the cosmos interactively.
